article_title: Obamacare Is An Entrepreneur's Best Friend

article_metadata.author: Micah Solomon

og.description: Here’s the simple, straight dope:  If we want more entrepreneurship in America, the fastest way to get there is via the Affordable Care Act (aka Obamacare) that's currently being held hostage in Washington. I've been an entrepreneur my entire adult life, apart from breaks for sleeping. I've worked with other entrepreneurs, and [...]
